cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CC. 

The paper discusses load balancing and distributed storage systems, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Distributed Systems (cs.DS) sub-categories. The paper also mentions applications in cryptography, which falls under the Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-category. The use of error-correcting codes suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the Dependability and Fault Tolerance (cs.DC) sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes new methods for constructing batch codes, which is related to the Coding Theory (cs.CC) sub-category.
